name: Ball-istic Bots
description:
Ball-istic Bots is a 2D physics-based top down shooter ball game.

This game is inspired by the Ballistic Mech from Metal Warriors SNES game. With my own twist on the mechanics and game play stuff, plus a variety of weapons and power-ups.

This is my first ever major project, I hope you enjoy it. Feedback and criticisms all welcome.
